body:
```
$ kubectl get nodes
NAME                                                  LABELS    STATUS
k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-1   <none>    Ready
k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-2   <none>    NotReady
k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-3   <none>    Ready
```

Node 2's kubelet logs:

```
E0513 17:35:31.557301   10906 kubelet.go:1298] error getting node: node k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-2 not found
E0513 17:35:31.666994   10906 kubelet.go:1767] Cannot get host IP: cannot get node: node k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-2 not found
I0513 17:35:31.667033   10906 manager.go:1222] Need to restart pod infra container for "etcd-server-k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-2_default" because it is not found
E0513 17:35:31.667968   10906 kubelet.go:1767] Cannot get host IP: cannot get node: node k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-2 not found
```

controller-manager side:

```
I0513 17:32:42.404862       7 nodecontroller.go:527] node k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-2 is never updated by kubelet
I0513 17:32:47.422920       7 nodecontroller.go:537] node k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-2 hasn't been updated for 1m5.422893194s. Last ready condition is: {Type:Ready Status:Unknown LastHeartbeatTime:2015-05-13 17:31:42 +0000 UTC LastTransitionTime:2015-05-13 17:32:42 +0000 UTC Reason:Kubelet never posted node status. Message:}
I0513 17:32:52.474976       7 nodecontroller.go:537] node k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-2 hasn't been updated for 1m10.474968033s. Last ready condition is: {Type:Ready Status:Unknown LastHeartbeatTime:2015-05-13 17:31:42 +0000 UTC LastTransitionTime:2015-05-13 17:32:42 +0000 UTC Reason:Kubelet never posted node status. Message:}
I0513 17:32:57.492246       7 nodecontroller.go:537] node k8s-staging-regtest-loop-2015-05-13-10-29-51-node-2 hasn't been updated for 1m15.492238494s. Last ready condition is: {Type:Ready Status:Unknown LastHeartbeatTime:2015-05-13 17:31:42 +0000 UTC L
```

I have a cluster to hand off if someone wants to debug. It's not a transient state: node 2 just failed to ever post a valid status.

cc @dchen1107 @davidopp 
cc @mbforbes @cjcullen (who looked at it briefly with me)
